thread.section_title: Hotel Tourisme Avenue - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value for the money
thread.title_full: Great value for the money - Review of Hotel Tourisme Avenue, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: corplawyer17
title: Great value for the money
text:
The room was very nice and the front desk staff were helpful. The best part was that the price is super reasonable for how nice it is. The location is great, being located close to a convenient metro station and lots of little restaurants around for a small, inexpensive breakfast in the morning. Would recommend again.
Room Tip: Some rooms overlook the subway so maybe ask if you are sensitive to noise. See more room tips
